name: Fleximinder
0:
”Alexa, tell Fleximinder that I have to buy a bike for my son.”
”Alexa, ask Fleximinder what do I have to buy for John.”
”Alexa, open Fleximinder.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flexi minder
des:
Dictate your notes into ones that are better than mere recordings or transcriptions through natural language search.

After "Open Fleximinder", try

📝 I have to call John on Friday
❔ Who do I have to call today? (on Fri.)
❔ Tell me about John [from this month...] (Gets everything about something)

📝 I have to buy a bike for my son
❔ What do I have to buy [for John...]?
❔ What do I have to do? (possibly long list, so qualify by date or other)

📝 I walked 5 miles today
📝 The color of the sky is blue 🙂
❔ Did I walk today?
❔ What did I do today?
❔ List my notes from October 5th
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
